<s>careful <\s> elaborate exposition of 
the structure of these organisms -
For instance I am not aware 
that hitherto - we have had any 
means of judging as to the true 
affinities of Alveolina and 
I regard Dr. Carpenters demonstration 
of its structural relationship with 
Orbitolites as a fact of the greatest 
interest and importance - and 
as an admirable example of the 
<s>importance <\s> necessity of the minute 
and detailed examination of these 
low organisms -
